title: Spirit of a Kyrie
description: In a white desert at a time of famine, Kit is among the starving children who beg and thieve the streets. Until one day, she discovers she has the makings of a great knight. Becoming a knight would bring her family wealth and prestige, but it also means risking her life to pass the Tests...Each book in the Sky Lands series is a standalone. The books can be read in any order. Recommended for ages 16+ due to scenes of violence.“good on atmosphere, and good on action... it manages condensed eloquence and power.” – Adam Roberts, three-time Arthur C. Clarke Award nominee“a really engaging read... it had me hooked, and kept me wanting to read on.” – Nick Gifford, bestselling teen fiction author
author: T.L. Rese
